meanings.definition: Not retiring or withdrawing from a position or activity.
meanings.sent1: She is an unretiring leader, always eager to take on new challenges.
meanings.sent2: The unretiring employee decided to continue working past retirement age.
meanings.sent3: Despite his age, the unretiring grandfather still volunteers at the local community center.
meanings.sent4: Her unretiring dedication to her job is truly inspiring to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The unretiring spirit of the team carried them to victory in the championship game.

meanings.definition: Not shy or reserved; outgoing and sociable.
meanings.sent1: He is known for his unretiring personality, always making new friends wherever he goes.
meanings.sent2: The unretiring host greeted each guest with a warm smile and friendly conversation.
meanings.sent3: The unretiring puppy eagerly wagged its tail at every passerby in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her unretiring charm and charisma made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The unretiring enthusiasm of the crowd made the event a huge success.
